channel.title: chef on (Dev)Ops observations
channel.description: Recent content in chef on (Dev)Ops observations

item.title: Chef without Chef server
item.description: There are couple alternatives available if you wish to use Chef in your infrastructure, but don’t have budget to setup hosted Chef service. So far I’ve seen one based on Git and another based on AWS S3.

item.title: Notes about Chef
item.description: Random notes about chef configuration management tool and related topics.
